briefTitle: Outpatient Administration of High Dose Methotrexate (HD MTX) in Patients With Osteosarcoma
officialTitle: Assessing the Safety, Feasibility, Cost Effectiveness and Patient Satisfaction of Outpatient Administration of High Dose Methotrexate (HD MTX) in Patients With Osteosarcoma
summary: The primary purpose of this study is to determine the safety and feasibility of delivering HDMTX in an outpatient setting.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Number of Outpatient High Dose Methotrexate Courses Which Result in an Inpatient Hospital Admission.
